home.headline: iOS Developer and AI Engineer
home.subline: I'm Marsha, a tech developer, where I code user interactive application features and Deep Learning for Image Classification. I am an University Student class of 2021.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Marsha is a Surabaya-based tech developer eager to contribute skills and enthusiasm to a challenging role where I can further explore cutting edge technologies in tech development, focusing on enhancing user experience and creating impactful tech solutions.

Apple Developer Academy @ UC.achievements: Successfully led the development of two applications, ArchCalculator and BillBro, showcasing technical skills and creativity. BillBro, designed for managing group expenses, has achieved over 100 downloads with a 5-star rating.

Teaching & Learning Innovation Center.achievements: Contributed to the development of innovative teaching tools that improved student engagement.

Universitas Ciputra Surabaya.achievements: Provided one-on-one support to students, helping them navigate challenges in their programming assignments.

Python.description: Able to implement a Deep Learning Model with the accuracy of 99.5% and publication in a Sinta-4-indexed journal

Swift.description: Led and released 2 iOS app to the AppStore, including BillBro which has achieved 100 downloads with a 5 star rating

MySQL.description: Database management for building websites and apps using MySql
